title: Gear Shift Race
description: Gear Shift Race is an adrenaline-fueled drag racing game that puts you in control of fully manual cars with realistic gear shifting and clutch timing. Set in a sprawling city ruled by rival street gangs and their powerful leaders, every race is a fight for speed, skill, and reputation. Rise through the underground ranks by defeating gang kings in intense drag battles. Earn cash and reputation to upgrade engine power, tuning, paint, and skins. Master precise gear shifts and perfect clutch control to unleash maximum acceleration. In Gear Shift Race, split-second decisions decide victory or defeat.
instructions: Tap or mouse click on the gear
tags: 2026 games, 3D, Arcade, Best Games, Car, Casual, endless, Racing, Sport, Traffic, wheel

gameControls.action: Shift gears at the correct time
Shift gears at the correct time

title: Cinderella Jigsaw Puzzle Collection
description: In today's game, you can put together several puzzles with the image of Cinderella and her friends. The highlight of the game is that here you can put not one puzzle, but several and choose the most beautiful one. If you are ready, you can proceed. First, you need to choose the most beautiful puzzle, the difficulty of folding. When everything is ready, you can start folding the most beautiful puzzle with Cinderella. If you are confused and do not know where to insert the desired piece of the puzzle, you will have a hint that will show you the whole picture for a few seconds. You need to remember everything carefully so that you can put this picture together from the puzzle. When the first puzzle is ready, you can proceed to the next one, so that as a result you have a whole set of folded puzzles

title: Mickey Mouse Match3
description: Agree that the toys from the series "three in a row" is not enough to surprise you. Especially for sophisticated gamers. However, in this game you will be in a team with Mickey Mouse himself! collect images of your favorite heroes in groups of three or more!
instructions: Use mouse or tap the screen

title: Car Eats Car: Dungeon Adventure
description: Up for a fight against rivals in a dynamic race on the highway? Overtake enemies and create your own car in the incubator in Car Eats Car: Dungeon Adventure! Your friends are put to prison - do everything you can to free evil cars! Good driving skills and turbo speed come in handy in this crazy driving simulator and a police chase game. Become a car tycoon, upgrade cars, and play for monster cars against the cops! Fight the boss to survive in these ultimate crazy races!
instructions: Space - Bombs X - Turbo W - Gas S - Brake A D - Balancing Arrow keys - Gas Brake Balancing
tags: 2D, Action, Car, Cars, Family, Race, Racing, WebGL

gameControls.action: Balance the car to the left
Balance the car to the right

title: Super World Adventure
description: Super World Adventure is a Platform – Adventure game where you will help the little hero rescue the princess in a fantasy world. Travel through many levels, collect coins, use power-ups, and defeat enemies to reach every castle. Enjoy this fantastic adventure, overcome obstacles, and become a hero.

title: Truckers: Offroad Cargo Transport
description: Become a true off-road master in a game where your main goal is to deliver valuable cargo through the harshest conditions! Get behind the wheel of legendary trucks such as ZIL, KamAZ, KrAZ, and UAZ, and set off on an unforgettable off-road journey. What makes the game unique? This game offers an exciting simulation of extreme cargo transportation, where every route is a real challenge. Who is this game for? The game is perfect for fans of trucks, simulators, and extreme driving. It’s a challenge for both newcomers and experienced players alike. Key Features: • Legendary trucks: ZIL, KamAZ, KrAZ, UAZ — choose your favorite! • Advanced ph
instructions: Mobile Controls On mobile devices you can choose between different control modes Use the accelerate and brake buttons and switch between forward and reverse gears All controls are displayed directly on the screen PC Controls bull W mdash acceler

title: Hoop Stack - Color Sort Puzzle
description: Hoop stack is a ring sorting puzzle game to keep you entertained for an hours. Water color sort puzzle games are no longer unique, that's why here is a new concept in the sorting puzzle game with colored hoop stack.
tags: .io, .io Games, 3D, 3D Games, Action, Adventure, Arcade, Brain, Casual, Color, drift, Fun, Funny, Hypercasual, Puzzle, Unity3D
